trans-unit.source: A secure and interoperable binding that supports federated security.
trans-unit.target: Un'associazione protetta e interoperabile che supporta la sicurezza federata.

trans-unit.source: Federation is the ability to share identities across multiple systems for authentication and authorization.
trans-unit.target: La federazione è la possibilità di condividere le identità di autenticazione e autorizzazione fra più sistemi.

trans-unit.source: These identities can refer to users or to machines.
trans-unit.target: Queste identità possono fare riferimento a utenti o computer.

trans-unit.source: Federated HTTP supports SOAP security as well as mixed-mode security, but it does not support exclusively using transport security.
trans-unit.target: Il protocollo HTTP federato supporta la sicurezza SOAP nonché una sicurezza a modalità mista, ma non supporta esclusivamente tramite la sicurezza del trasporto.

trans-unit.source: This binding provides [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] support for the WS-Federation protocol.
trans-unit.target: Questa associazione fornisce [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] il supporto per il protocollo WS-Federation.

trans-unit.source: Services configured with this binding must use the HTTP transport.
trans-unit.target: Servizi configurati con questa associazione devono usare il trasporto HTTP.

trans-unit.source: Bindings consist of a stack of binding elements.
trans-unit.target: Le associazioni sono costituite da uno stack di elementi di associazione.

trans-unit.source: The stack of binding elements in WSFederationHttpBinding is the same as that contained in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> when <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> is set to the default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.
trans-unit.target: Lo stack di elementi di associazione in WSFederationHttpBinding è uguale a quello contenuto in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>quando <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A>è impostata sul valore predefinito di <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: The WSFederationHttpBinding controls the details of the message security settings, the values of which are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il classe WSFederationHttpBinding controlla i dettagli delle impostazioni di sicurezza del messaggio, i cui valori sono disponibili dall'istanza di <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>restituito dal <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>

trans-unit.source: The WSFederationHttpBinding also provides a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.PrivacyNoticeAt%2A> property to set and retrieve the URI at which the privacy notice is located.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce inoltre il WSFederationHttpBinding un <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.PrivacyNoticeAt%2A>proprietà per impostare e recuperare l'URI presso cui è disponibile l'informativa sulla privacy.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.PrivacyNoticeAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When calling a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service built with [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/add/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] from a WCF client application built with [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] or earlier, the configuration file generated by svcutil.exe or adding a service reference from [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] contains the `establishSecurityContext` attribute in the binding configuration.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando si chiama un [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] servizio compilato con [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/add/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] da un'applicazione client WCF compilata con [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] o precedente, il file di configurazione generato da svcutil.exe o aggiungendo un riferimento al servizio da [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] contiene il `establishSecurityContext` attributo nella configurazione dell'associazione.

trans-unit.source: This attribute is not recognized by the [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] runtime and the application throws an <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> with the message "Unrecognized attribute establishSecurityContext ".
trans-unit.target: Questo attributo non ha riconosciuto il [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] runtime e l'applicazione genera un <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException>con il messaggio "attributo 'establishsecuritycontext'".</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException>

trans-unit.source: To workaround this problem, remove the `establishSecurityContext` attribute from the binding configuration.
trans-unit.target: Per risolvere questo problema, rimuovere il `establishSecurityContext` attributo dalla configurazione di associazione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The details of these settings are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I dettagli di queste impostazioni sono disponibili dall'istanza di <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>restituito dal <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"> </xref> classe con un tipo specificato di sicurezza utilizzato dall'associazione.

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> which specifies that integrity, confidentiality, and server and client authentication are provided using SOAP message security.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito di <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>è <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>che consente di specificare che l'autenticazione dell'integrità, riservatezza e server e client sono fornite usando la sicurezza dei messaggi SOAP.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The details of these settings are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I dettagli di queste impostazioni sono disponibili dall'istanza di <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>restituito dal <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> che specifica il tipo di sicurezza utilizzato con il messaggio SOAP e per il client.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a binding specified by its configuration name.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"> </xref> classe con un'associazione specificata in base al nome di configurazione.

trans-unit.source: The binding configuration name for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il nome di configurazione di associazione per il <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The binding element with the name configurationName was not found.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento di associazione con il nome configurationName non è stato trovato.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding and a value that indicates whether a reliable session is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"> </xref> classe con un tipo specificato di sicurezza utilizzato dall'associazione e un valore che indica se una sessione affidabile è abilitata.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> che specifica il tipo di sicurezza utilizzato con il messaggio SOAP e per il client.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a reliable session is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se una sessione affidabile è abilitata. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a collection with the binding elements for the binding.
trans-unit.target: Crea una raccolta con gli elementi di associazione per l'associazione.

trans-unit.source: The stack of binding elements depends on the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> set.
trans-unit.target: Lo stack di elementi di associazione dipende dal valore del <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>impostato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The stack of binding elements in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding> is the same as that contained in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> when <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> is set to the default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.
trans-unit.target: Lo stack di elementi di associazione <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding>è uguale a quello contenuto in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>quando <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A>è impostata sul valore predefinito di <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>2.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>3.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>4.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement> However, setting <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> results in a stack that is something of a hybrid between the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding> bindings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>Tuttavia, l'impostazione <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>per <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>un stack è una sorta di ibrido tra le <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>associazioni.</xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>2.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement>3.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>4.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement> Finally, using the MTOM encoder looks exactly the same as for <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement>Infine, tramite il codificatore MTOM è del tutto analogo a quello <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>2.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement>3.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> that makes up the binding.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> di tipo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>che costituisce l'associazione.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> that has enabled a reliable session.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>che ha abilitato una sessione affidabile.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> that has enabled a reliable session.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>che ha abilitato una sessione affidabile.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Returns the transport binding element from the current binding.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'elemento di associazione di trasporto dell'associazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> from the current binding.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>dell'associazione corrente.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URI at which the privacy notice is located.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'URI presso cui è disponibile l'informativa sulla privacy.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> at which the privacy notice is located.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Uri>in cui si trova l'informativa sulla privacy.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the privacy notice version number for the binding.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il numero di versione informativa sulla privacy per l'associazione.

trans-unit.source: The version number of the privacy notice.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di versione dell'informativa sulla privacy.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of security used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il tipo di sicurezza utilizzato con questa associazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity"></xref> that specifies the mode of security used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity"> </xref> che specifica la modalità di sicurezza utilizzato con questa associazione.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref> for this binding is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> per questa associazione è <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se il <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*>proprietà è stato modificato rispetto al valore predefinito e deve essere serializzata.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*>valore della proprietà deve essere serializzato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*>
